did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: James City County (Va.) List of Tithables, 1792-1793

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: James City County (Va.) List of Tithables, 1792-1793. Local government records collection, James City County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia under the accession number 24194.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: James City County was an original shire formed in 1634. Part of New Kent County was added later. Part of York County was added in 1852.
During the Civil War, the records of James City County and Williamsburg were transferred to Richmond for safekeeping but were destroyed by fire in Richmond on 3 April 1865.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: James City (Va.) List of Tithables, 1792-1793. Consists of a photocopy of the list of tithable heads of household in the county for the years 1792 and 1793.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional James City County Tax and Fiscal Records can be found on microfilm at The Library of Virginia. Consult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm."
See the Lost Records Localities Digital Collection available at Virginia Memory.
For more information and a listing of lost records localities see Lost Records research note.
